verses.verse: In the tenth<WH6224> year,<WH8141> in the tenth<WH6224> month, in the twelfth<WH8147> <WH6240> day of the month,<WH2320> the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me, saying,<WH559>

Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> set<WH7760> your face<WH6440> against<WH5921> Pharaoh<WH6547> king<WH4428> of Egypt,<WH4714> and prophesy<WH5012> against<WH5921> him, and against<WH5921> all<WH3605> Egypt:<WH4714>

Speak,<WH1696> and say,<WH559> Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Behold,<WH2005> I am against<WH5921> you, Pharaoh<WH6547> king<WH4428> of Egypt,<WH4714> the great<WH1419> dragon<WH8577> that lies<WH6437> in the middle<WH8432> of his rivers,<WH2975> which has said,<WH559> My river<WH2975> is my own, and I have made<WH6213> it for myself.

But I will put<WH5414> hooks<WH2397> in your jaws,<WH3895> and I will cause the fish<WH1710> of your rivers<WH2975> to stick<WH1692> to your scales,<WH7193> and I will bring<WH5927> you up out of the middle<WH8432> of your rivers,<WH2975> and all<WH3605> the fish<WH1710> of your rivers<WH2975> shall stick<WH1692> to your scales.<WH7193>

And I will leave<WH5203> you thrown into the wilderness,<WH4057> you and all<WH3605> the fish<WH1710> of your rivers:<WH2975> you shall fall<WH5307> on the open<WH6440> fields;<WH7704> you shall not be brought<WH622> together, nor<WH3808> gathered:<WH6908> I have given<WH5414> you for meat<WH402> to the beasts<WH2416> of the field<WH776> and to the fowls<WH5775> of the heaven.<WH8064>

And all<WH3605> the inhabitants<WH3427> of Egypt<WH4714> shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD,<WH3068> because<WH3282> they have been<WH1961> a staff<WH4938> of reed<WH7070> to the house<WH1004> of Israel.<WH3478>

When they took<WH8610> hold<WH8610> of you by your hand,<WH3709> you did break,<WH7533> and rend<WH1234> all<WH3605> their shoulder:<WH3802> and when they leaned<WH8172> on you, you brake,<WH7665> and made all<WH3605> their loins<WH4975> to be at a stand.<WH5976>
Therefore<WH3651> thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Behold,<WH2005> I will bring<WH935> a sword<WH2719> on you, and cut<WH3772> off man<WH120> and beast<WH929> out of you.

And the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> shall be desolate<WH8077> and waste;<WH2723> and they shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD:<WH3068> because<WH3282> he has said,<WH559> The river<WH2975> is mine, and I have made<WH6213> it.

Behold,<WH2005> therefore<WH3651> I am against<WH413> you, and against<WH413> your rivers,<WH2975> and I will make<WH5414> the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> utterly waste<WH2723> and desolate,<WH8077> from the tower<WH4024> of Syene<WH5482> even to the border<WH1366> of Ethiopia.<WH3568>

No<WH3808> foot<WH7272> of man<WH120> shall pass<WH5674> through it, nor<WH3808> foot<WH7272> of beast<WH929> shall pass<WH5674> through it, neither<WH3808> shall it be inhabited<WH3427> forty<WH705> years.<WH8141>

And I will make<WH5414> the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> desolate<WH8077> in the middle<WH8432> of the countries<WH776> that are desolate,<WH8074> and her cities<WH5892> among<WH8432> the cities<WH5892> that are laid waste<WH2717> shall be desolate<WH8077> forty<WH705> years:<WH8141> and I will scatter<WH6327> the Egyptians<WH4714> among the nations,<WH1471> and will disperse<WH2219> them through the countries.<WH776>

Yet<WH3588> thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> At the end<WH7093> of forty<WH705> years<WH8141> will I gather<WH6908> the Egyptians<WH4714> from the people<WH5971> where<WH834> <WH8033> they were scattered:<WH6327>

And I will bring<WH7725> again<WH7725> the captivity<WH7622> of Egypt,<WH4714> and will cause them to return<WH7725> into the land<WH776> of Pathros,<WH6624> into<WH5921> the land<WH776> of their habitation;<WH4351> and they shall be there<WH8033> a base<WH8217> kingdom.<WH4467>

It shall be the basest<WH8217> of the kingdoms;<WH4467> neither<WH3808> shall it exalt<WH5375> itself any more above<WH5921> the nations:<WH1471> for I will diminish<WH4591> them, that they shall no<WH3808> more rule<WH7287> over<WH5921> the nations.<WH1471>

And it shall be no<WH3808> more<WH5750> the confidence<WH4009> of the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> which brings<WH2142> their iniquity<WH5771> to remembrance,<WH2142> when they shall look<WH6437> after<WH310> them: but they shall know<WH3045> that I am the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>

And it came<WH1961> to pass in the seven<WH7651> and twentieth<WH6242> year,<WH8141> in the first<WH7223> month, in the first<WH259> day of the month,<WH2320> the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me, saying,<WH559>

Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> Nebuchadrezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> caused his army<WH2428> to serve<WH5647> a great<WH1419> service<WH5656> against<WH413> Tyrus:<WH6865> every<WH3605> head<WH7218> was made bald,<WH7139> and every<WH3605> shoulder<WH3802> was peeled:<WH4803> yet had<WH1961> he no<WH3808> wages,<WH7939> nor his army,<WH2428> for Tyrus,<WH6865> for the service<WH5656> that he had served<WH5647> against<WH5921> it:

Therefore<WH3651> thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Behold,<WH2005> I will give<WH5414> the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> to Nebuchadrezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon;<WH894> and he shall take<WH5375> her multitude,<WH1995> and take<WH962> her spoil,<WH7997> and take<WH962> her prey;<WH957> and it shall be the wages<WH7939> for his army.<WH2428>

I have given<WH5414> him the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> for his labor<WH6468> with which<WH834> he served<WH5647> against it, because<WH834> they worked<WH6213> for me, said<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>

In that day<WH3117> will I cause the horn<WH7161> of the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> to bud<WH6779> forth, and I will give<WH5414> you the opening<WH6610> of the mouth<WH6310> in the middle<WH8432> of them; and they shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD.<WH3068>
